introduction.template: Write a concise summary in {LANG} of the Introduction. Focus on background, gap, objective, and approach. Give me a structured piece of text ready to copy. Do not add comments to your response.

methods.template: Summarize in {LANG} the Methods focusing on experimental design, core procedures, and recombinant costructs used in the study. Give me a short structured piece of text ready to copy. Do not add comments to your response.

results.template: Summarize in {LANG} this Results subsection of a scientific article: key findings, comparisons, and reported metrics. No speculation, just authors' interpretations. Give me a piece of text without internal sections ready to copy. Do not add comments to your response. IMPORTANT: keep all figure and table references (excluding supplementary figures/tables) in your response.

discussion.template: Summarize in {LANG} the Discussion: interpretation, implications, limitations, and main conclusions. Give me a short structured piece of text ready to copy. Do not add comments to your response.

key_points.template: In {LANG}, produce 3–8 key bullet points capturing the paper’s main contributions and outcomes.  No speculation, just authors' interpretations. Give me a short structured piece of text ready to copy. Do not add comments to your response.

abbreviations.template: In {LANG}, extract all abbreviations used in the article and provide their full definitions. Return ONLY a clean list of abbreviation–definition pairs, one per line, in the format: ABBR — definition. No extra text.

figure_narrative.template: In {LANG}, create a coherent narrative of the figures: what each figure shows and the overall story. IMPORTANT: keep all figure references. Give me a short structured piece of text ready to copy. Do not add comments to your response.
